title: Bakkt struggles with crypto business, says it might ‘not be able to continue’
description: Bakkt has warned the SEC in a filing that it may not be able to continue its business in the next 12 months.

title: Experimental ERC-404 Token Surges To $170M Market Cap
description: ERC-404, a novel and experimental token standard on Ethereum combining the attributes of NFTs and cryptocurrencies, has rocketed to a $170M market cap, generating $87M in trades.
